value:
I won't waver anymore... I will build
an age in which everyone can live
their lives in peace!

I once thought Prince Pelleas ought
to be ruler... But the people put their
faith in me—I must do right by them.

It's always "My Queen this" and "My
Queen that." I know it's the way of
things, but the formality is tiresome...

Whoops! Almost took a tumble there!
I guess I'm still not used to this outfit.
Thanks for having my back, as usual.

I've been getting the feeling Yune still
watches from somewhere just out of
sight. Always up to some mischief...

I'm visiting on behalf of your good
friend, $Nf.

We will build the future with our own
hands! Yune, please watch over us!

I must fight now to forge a future age
of peace!

I mustn't get discouraged! Not now,
after Daein placed its trust in me!

Thank you. I will use this power for
the benefit of all.

I am Micaiah. I hope to lead Daein as
best I can. Any support you can offer
is appreciated.

My world is one of constant strife.
People fought for power, influence,
and even just for their daily bread...$k$pThe fact is, the weak are no match
for the strong... But I couldn't stay
silent and watch from a distance.$k$pThus, the Dawn Brigade was born...
and with help from Sothe and the
others, Daein has been restored.$k$pBy following my heart and giving a
voice to those who had none, I was
able to change Tellian history...$k$pYou and I are similar in that sense.
This world needs you just as mine
needed me. I can feel it.$k$pBut I wouldn't call that a prophecy...
more like a belief. Nevertheless, I am
happy to join you in walking this path.
はいっ
これで…
ああっ
そんな…！
For the hope of all!
Get behind me!
I won't let you win!
Will of the goddess...
I...let you down...
*sigh*
I am Queen Micaiah, fifteenth ruler of Daein. It is a pleasure to meet you.
Ah! Yun—! Oh... I thought you were someone else—but, she's gone now...
As Daein's ruler, it is my duty to defend it as the precious place it is...
Yune may be gone, but...I have a feeling she still watches over us.
Sothe is my constant companion—even in times of trouble. Thanks to him, I know I'm safe.
Please, Ashera...Yune... Believe in us again like you once did!
If we can unite behind a purpose, we can overcome any obstacle! There is no truth more wonderful.
Of course.
I see.
For Daein!
